price: Allah će njima oprostiti; Allah je Onaj Koji stalno poništava grijehe i oprašta.
arabic: فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَعۡفُوَ عَنۡهُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَفُوًّا غَفُورٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-ulāika ʿasā al-lahu an yaʿfuwa ʿanhum wakāna al-lahu ʿafuwwan ghafūran
